name: React Hook Form Controller 最小
description: Controller でカスタムコンポーネントを制御する最小例

files.template:
import { useForm, Controller } from 'react-hook-form';
export default function FormCmp(){ const { control, handleSubmit } = useForm<{ name:string }>(); return (<form onSubmit={handleSubmit(()=>{})}><Controller control={control} name='name' render={({ field })=> (<input {...field} />)} /></form>); }
